info.name: Pioneer DDJ-FLX10
info.author: Lougazi(AKA Sweet Lou)
info.description: All controls xml functional except jog wheels, pads, displays, etc... that need script. They were to be in the script only as to keep down xml size ideally I tried to keep as many of the controls on the xml as possible to utilize builtin Mixxx control system
info.forums: Mentioned in Reddit and Mixxx forum, experimental.

control.description: CUE +SHIFT (DECK1) - press - Jump to track start
CUE +SHIFT (DECK2) - press - Jump to track start
CUE +SHIFT (DECK3) - press - Jump to track start
CUE +SHIFT (DECK4) - press - Jump to track start
